testcase.name: should be able to init a session
should be able to see the demo UI
should be able to see the Joyride container
Hero - should be able to show the standalone tooltip
Hero - should be able to hide the standalone tooltip
Hero - should start the tour when clicking the button
Projects - should have scrolled to the element
Projects - should be able to see the beacon
Projects - should be able to see the tooltip UI
Projects - should be able to close the tooltip
Mission - should have scrolled to the element
Mission - should be able to see the beacon
Mission - should be able to see the tooltip UI
Mission - should be able to advance the tour by clicking the step's target button
About - should have scrolled to the element
About - should be able to see the tooltip UI
About - should be able to close the tooltip
Footer - should be able to see the tooltip UI
Footer - should be able to close the tooltip
Footer - should be able to show the standalone tooltip
Footer - should be able to hide the standalone tooltip
